description:
What will you get from this course?

Understand and correctly apply the software prototyping methodology when creating a mobile app.

More and more companies require mobile app design experience and by taking this course you will have the proper design thinking when approaching any mobile project.

You will be a better UX professional by enhancing your skill set and last but not least, you will be able to prototype apps with Axure RP, generate and test them directly on your phone.

The necessary steps to prototype a great mobile experience detailed in this course are:

-Identifying the basic requirements

-Developing the initial prototype

-Reviewing and gathering feedback

-Revising and enhancing the prototype

Throughout the course we will create a native iOS App, starting from the ideation process, moving on to drawing ideas and wireframing a basic concept. Along the way, with each iteration, we will add new elements and complex interactions until we reach the result and experience we are looking for.

Our main goal is to learn how to build a robust prototype in a structured manner by constantly refining it.
title: Mobile UX Design Process: Create a Successful App
